trans-unit.source: Provides a read-only collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce un insieme di sola lettura di oggetti <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.TransformerTypeCollection> class represents a read-only collection of objects, typically used by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> objects to manage sets of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> objects.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.TransformerTypeCollection> classe rappresenta una raccolta di sola lettura di oggetti, in genere utilizzati dagli <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> oggetti per gestire i set di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control uses a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.TransformerTypeCollection> collection to keep a list of available <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> objects on a page, whereas a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> object uses a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.TransformerTypeCollection> collection to track the available <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> objects that it contains.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> controlli utilizza una <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.TransformerTypeCollection> insieme per mantenere un elenco di disponibili <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> oggetti in una pagina, mentre un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> viene utilizzata da object un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.TransformerTypeCollection> insieme per tenere traccia disponibili <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> oggetti in esso contenuti.

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.TransformerTypeCollection> collection is read-only, you can make programmatic changes to the properties of the underlying controls referenced in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Sebbene il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.TransformerTypeCollection> raccolta è di sola lettura, è possibile apportare modifiche a livello di codice alle proprietà dei controlli sottostanti a cui viene fatto riferimento nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.TransformerTypeCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.TransformerTypeCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.TransformerTypeCollection" /> class with no members in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.TransformerTypeCollection" /> senza membri nell'insieme.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Raccolta di oggetti <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.TransformerTypeCollection" /> class containing the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.TransformerTypeCollection" /> contenente gli oggetti <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> specificati.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="transformerTypes" /> contains objects that are not transformers.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="transformerTypes" /> contiene oggetti che non sono trasformatori.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> objects already contained in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.TransformerTypeCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Insieme di oggetti <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> già contenuti in una classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.TransformerTypeCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> objects to combine with the collection in the <c>existingTransformerTypes</c> parameter.
trans-unit.target: Raccolta di oggetti <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> da combinare alla raccolta nel parametro <c>existingTransformerTypes</c>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.TransformerTypeCollection" /> class by combining an existing <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.TransformerTypeCollection" /> collection with the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.TransformerTypeCollection" /> unendo un insieme <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.TransformerTypeCollection" /> esistente con gli oggetti <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> specificati.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="transformerTypes" /> contains objects that are not transformers.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="transformerTypes" /> contiene oggetti che non sono trasformatori.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> that is checked to determine whether it is in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Controllo <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> che viene verificato per determinare se è incluso nell'insieme.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether a particular transformer exists in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un valore che indica se uno specifico trasformatore è presente nell'insieme.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether a particular transformer is in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Valore booleano che indica se uno specifico trasformatore è presente nell'insieme.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.TransformerTypeCollection.Contains%2A> method enables you to check a particular <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> object and determine whether it is part of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.TransformerTypeCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.TransformerTypeCollection.Contains%2A> metodo consente di controllare un determinato <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> dell'oggetto e determinare se fa parte di un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.TransformerTypeCollection> insieme.

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> objects to contain the copied collection.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di oggetti <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> in cui è contenuto l'insieme copiato.

trans-unit.source: The starting point in the array at which to place the collection contents.
trans-unit.target: Punto di partenza nella matrice in corrispondenza del quale inserire il contenuto dell'insieme.

trans-unit.source: Copies the collection to an array of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Copia l'insieme in una matrice di oggetti <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.TransformerTypeCollection.CopyTo%2A> method is useful when you want to assemble a custom array that can contain all the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> objects in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.TransformerTypeCollection> collection, a subset of those objects, or a superset of those objects.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.TransformerTypeCollection.CopyTo%2A> metodo è utile quando si desidera comporre una matrice personalizzata che può contenere tutti i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> gli oggetti il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.TransformerTypeCollection> insieme, un subset di tali oggetti o un superset di tali oggetti.

trans-unit.source: Creates a collection for storing transformers.
trans-unit.target: Crea un insieme in cui archiviare i trasformatori.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.TransformerTypeCollection.Empty> field creates and returns a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.TransformerTypeCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.TransformerTypeCollection.Empty> campo Crea e restituisce una nuova istanza di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.TransformerTypeCollection> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The instance is created through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.TransformerTypeCollection.%23ctor%2A> constructor and does not contain any existing members in the collection.
trans-unit.target: L'istanza viene creata tramite il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.TransformerTypeCollection.%23ctor%2A> costruttore e non contiene tutti i membri esistenti nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> that is a member of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> che corrisponde a un membro dell'insieme.

trans-unit.source: Returns the position of a particular member in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce la posizione di un membro specifico dell'insieme.

trans-unit.source: An integer that indicates the position of a particular object in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Integer che indica la posizione di un oggetto specifico nell'insieme.

trans-unit.source: The index of a particular <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> in a collection.
trans-unit.target: Indice di un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> specifico in un insieme.

trans-unit.source: Gets a member of the collection based on its position in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un membro dell'insieme in base alla relativa posizione nell'insieme.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> located at <paramref name="index" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> che si trova in <paramref name="index" />.
